awards.title: Best Paper Award
awards.awarder: Korean Institute of Information Scientists and Engineers (KIISE)
awards.summary: Received the Best Paper Award as the first author at the KCC2025 Conference. Paper: "Callisto: Cost-Efficient AI Development Platform Using Spot Instances"

awards.title: AWS Summit Seoul 2024 GameDay - Generative AI 2nd Place (Round 2)
AWS Rookie Championship 2023 - AWS JAM 1st Place

work.name: ETRI (Electronics and Telecommunications Research Institute)
highlights: Built distributed training and MLOps environments in containerized (Kubernetes) infrastructure managing 100+ GPU clusters
Researched efficient LLM training utilizing Data Parallelism and Fully Sharded Data Parallel (FSDP) techniques
Conducted research on efficient LLM fine-tuning using LoRA/QLoRA methods and quantization techniques
